text: Ke kaloku kwisizwe ngasinye Simisele amasiko enkolo, khon’ukuze apho kuwo bakhankanye igama lika-Allâh phezu kwesilwanyana (Yena uAllâh) Abanikele ukuba sibe kukudla kubo. Kananjalo uThixo wenu nguThixo oMnye, ngoko ke zinikeleni kuYe, kananjalo wena (Muhammad) nika iindaba ezivuyisayo kwabathobekileyo
